open the floodgates.translation[0].defin: if something opens the floodgates, or if the floodgates open, it suddenly becomes possible for a lot of things to happen which were prevented from happening before
If this case is successful it could open the floodgates for thousands of similar claims.
There are fears that the floodgates will open and large numbers of parents will take their children out of school.
if the floodgates open, or if something opens the floodgates, someone begins to cry and show their emotions after keeping them hidden
His display of kindness to her opened the floodgates again, and she began to sob loudly.
